content: a sustainable and vibrantly colored toy or a great addition to a crochet fruit & vegetable center piece you ll receive a downloadable 6-page pdf pattern with detailed instructions and lots of clear pictures to help you along the way this pattern is also accompanied by a video tutorial which covers the making of the green onion in it s entirety i am always available to help and answer questions as well this scallion crochet pattern is written in us terms size using dk weight yarn and a 3 00mm crochet hook the green onion will end up being about 9 inches skill level beginner - the pattern uses basic stitches simple stitch patterns & techniques and simple color work __________ join me subscribe to the off the beaten hook community for free patterns video tutorials and printable guides & resources blog https //offthebeatenhook com/ instagram https //www instagram com/offthebeatenhook/ facebook https //www facebook com/offthebeatenhook pinterest https //www pinterest com/offthebeatenhook youtube https //www youtube com/@offthebeatenhook2985 this pattern is for personal use only this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced resold distributed published altered translated posted or shared without authorization you can sell your finished items provided that you credit off the beaten hook as the designer but you may not use my photos for your listing
